description:
iPearl mCover® Collection for Kindle & Nook eBook ReadersProduct Highlights:+ Designed to fit the4th generation Kindle (6" Display, WIFI, 5-way controller)and
 protect it against scratches and accidental damages.+Built-in inner pocket to hold miscellaneous stuff like money or credit cards.+ The left side can be folded back easily just like a paperback book.+6 vibrant colors (Aqua/Black/Blue/White/Green/Pink)availableThis case is NOT compatible with:— new 6" Kindle Paperwhite released in Oct. 2012— older 1st, 2nd and 3rd (Kindle Keyboard) Generation Kindle— Kindle Touch, Kindle Fire and Kindle DXiPearl Inc is proud of being a"A"-rating BBB Accredited Businesscommitting to customer satisfaction.iPearl offers protective cases for ALL Current MacBook models and selected popular PC laptops.iPearl mCover® cases protect over600,000Mac | PC laptops and100,000Kindle/Nook readers around the world so far!Do not simply take our words for it, there are over12,000 reviewsfor iPearl mCover® products at Amazon website.(Updated on April 4, 2013)
